casebody.data:
In re D.L.W., D.L.N.W., V.A.W.-252P15-1. No. 252P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 22, 2015. Richard Croutharmel, Raleigh, for Worth, Dammien Lamar. Jeffrey William Gillette, for Wade, Marisha Nicole. Jamie L. Hamlett, for Alamance County DSS. Derrick J. Hensley, GAL Appellate Counsel, for D.L.W., et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of July 2015 by Petitioner and GAL for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of July 2015."
